【考法 1】 v. 使尴尬： to put into a state of perplexity and embarrassment
【例】 He was discomfited by the awkward situation of having his ex-girlfriend meet his current one. 他的前女友 看到他现任女友的情况让他很尴尬。
【近】 embarrass, abash, faze, fluster, mortify, nonplus, rattle

【考法 2】 v. 阻碍： to prevent from achieving a goal
【例】 Constant interruptions discomfited her in her attempt to finish the speech. 经常的打断她讲话使她无法完成演讲。
【近】 balk, foil, thwart, baffle, checkmate
【反】 advance, forward, foster, further, promote 推进，促进；encourage 鼓励

【记】 comfort 舒服，舒适；dis + comfort 使不舒服困惑尴尬
